titleStmt.title: By the king, a proclamation whereas by a statute made in the twenty seventh year of the reign of the late Queen Elizabeth, it is ... enacted, that if any of the subjects of this kingdom ... shall be of, or brought up in any college of Jesuits or seminary erected or ordained in any parts beyond the seas ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)

titleStmt.title: By the king, a proclamation whereas by a statute made in the twenty seventh year of the reign of the late Queen Elizabeth, it is ... enacted, that if any of the subjects of this kingdom ... shall be of, or brought up in any college of Jesuits or seminary erected or ordained in any parts beyond the seas ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the Executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our Court at Kensington, the Eleventh Day of February, 1699. In the Eleventh Year of Our Reign."
Proclamation ordering all Catholic priests and Jesuits out of England.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the Executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd
